### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  disease_diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan VARCHAR(200)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE patient_data SET age = 30 WHERE patient_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
    treatment_date DATE,
    duration_days INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE patients SET age = 25 WHERE patient_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  city VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  severity VARCHAR(20),
  affected_organ VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  effectiveness_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  hospital_name VARCHAR(50)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Patients SET age = 30 WHERE patient_id = 1;
